mapper.select:
select nvl(sum(ch.coin), 0) from coin_history ch
and ch.created_at >= to_date(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
and ch.created_at < to_date(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1

select nvl(sum(ch.at_that_price), 0) from coin_history ch
and ch.created_at >= to_date(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
and ch.created_at < to_date(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1

select nvl(sum(pm.at_that_coin), 0) from purchase_music pm join purchase_history ph on ph.purchase_history_id = pm.purchase_history_id
and ph.purchased_at >= to_date(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
and ph.purchased_at < to_date(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1

select to_char(trunc(ch.created_at), 'yyyy-mm-dd') as bucket, nvl(sum(ch.coin), 0) as value from coin_history ch
and ch.created_at >= to_date(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
and ch.created_at < to_date(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1
group by trunc(ch.created_at) order by 1

select to_char(trunc(ph.purchased_at), 'yyyy-mm-dd') as bucket, nvl(sum(pm.at_that_coin), 0) as value from purchase_music pm join purchase_history ph on ph.purchase_history_id = pm.purchase_history_id
and ph.purchased_at >= to_date(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
and ph.purchased_at < to_date(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1
group by trunc(ph.purchased_at) order by 1

select u.user_id as userid, u.nickname as nickname, nvl(sum(ch.coin), 0) as totalcoin from coin_history ch join users u on u.user_id = ch.user_id
and ch.created_at >= to_date(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
and ch.created_at < to_date(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1
group by u.user_id, u.nickname order by totalcoin desc fetch first 10 rows only

select u.user_id as userid, u.nickname as nickname, nvl(sum(pm.at_that_coin), 0) as usedcoin from purchase_music pm join purchase_history ph on ph.purchase_history_id = pm.purchase_history_id join users u on u.user_id = ph.user_id
and ph.purchased_at >= to_date(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
and ph.purchased_at < to_date(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1
group by u.user_id, u.nickname order by usedcoin desc fetch first 10 rows only

select to_char(trunc(u.registered_at), 'yyyy-mm-dd') as bucket, count(*) as value from users u
and u.registered_at >= to_date(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
and u.registered_at < to_date(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1
group by trunc(u.registered_at) order by 1
select u.status as status, count(*) as cnt from users u group by u.status

select pm.music_id as musicid, count(*) as soldcount, nvl(sum(pm.at_that_coin), 0) as coinsum from purchase_music pm join purchase_history ph on ph.purchase_history_id = pm.purchase_history_id
and ph.purchased_at >= to_date(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
and ph.purchased_at < to_date(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1
group by pm.music_id order by soldcount desc, coinsum desc fetch first 10 rows only
